snippet: Time Warner and Vice Media are said to be in negotiations that could lead to a $1 billion deal and give Vice a television network.
abstract: Time Warner is in talks to buy large stake in Vice Media for as much as $1 billion, deal that could include providing Vice with television network HLN.
lead_paragraph: Time Warner and Vice Media are said to be in negotiations that could lead to a $1 billion deal and give Vice a television network.

headline.main: Time Warner Said to Seek a Big Stake in Vice Media
headline.print_headline: Time Warner Said to Seek a Big Stake in Vice Media
